mapper.select:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.csp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP141Mapper.CSPDCP141QSelect1 */
WITH DATA AS ( SELECT D1.CVPT_KND_CD , D2.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD , D3.PUB_DVSN_CD , D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD , D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD FROM TBCSPDCP101M D1 , TBCSPDCP201M D2 , (SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD ,S1.ACP_YR ,S1.CVPT_ACP_NO ,S1.PUB_DVSN_CD FROM TBCSPDCP206L S1 WHERE S1.ORG_HIS_DVSN_CD = 1 AND ( S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO, S1.HNDL_ORG_SRNO ) IN ( SELECT REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO, MIN(HNDL_ORG_SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP206L WHERE ORG_HIS_DVSN_CD = 1 GROUP BY REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO ) ) D3 ,( SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD , S1.CVPT_ACP_NO , S1.ACP_YR , S1.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD FROM TBCSPDCP205L S1 WHERE ( S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO, S1.SRNO ) IN ( SELECT REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO, MIN(SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP205L GROUP BY REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO ) ) D4 WHERE 1=1 AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = D2.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND D1.ACP_YR = D2.ACP_YR(+) AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = D2.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = D3.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND D1.ACP_YR = D3.ACP_YR(+) AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = D3.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = D4.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND D1.ACP_YR = D4.ACP_YR(+) AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = D4.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = 1
AND TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{acpDhs}, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{acpDhe}, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_CHAR(D2.FNL_HNDL_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{acpDhs}, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{acpDhe}, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')
), PRE_DATA AS ( SELECT D1.CVPT_KND_CD , D2.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD , D3.PUB_DVSN_CD , D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD , D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD FROM TBCSPDCP101M D1 , TBCSPDCP201M D2 , (SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD ,S1.ACP_YR ,S1.CVPT_ACP_NO ,S1.PUB_DVSN_CD FROM TBCSPDCP206L S1 WHERE S1.ORG_HIS_DVSN_CD = 1 AND ( S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO, S1.HNDL_ORG_SRNO ) IN ( SELECT REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO, MIN(HNDL_ORG_SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP206L WHERE ORG_HIS_DVSN_CD = 1 GROUP BY REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO ) ) D3 ,( SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD , S1.CVPT_ACP_NO , S1.ACP_YR , S1.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD FROM TBCSPDCP205L S1 WHERE ( S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO, S1.SRNO ) IN ( SELECT REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO, MIN(SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP205L GROUP BY REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO ) ) D4 WHERE 1=1 AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = D2.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND D1.ACP_YR = D2.ACP_YR(+) AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = D2.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = D3.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND D1.ACP_YR = D3.ACP_YR(+) AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = D3.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = D4.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND D1.ACP_YR = D4.ACP_YR(+) AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = D4.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = 1
AND TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{acpDhs}, 'YYYYMMDD'), -12),'dd'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{acpDhe}, 'YYYYMMDD'), -12),'dd'), 'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_CHAR(D2.FNL_HNDL_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{acpDhs}, 'YYYYMMDD'), -12),'dd'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{acpDhe}, 'YYYYMMDD'), -12),'dd'), 'YYYYMMDD')
)
SELECT NULL AS CD , '합계' AS CD_NM , COUNT(1) AS CNT , CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (COUNT(1) / COUNT(1)) * 100 END AS PER , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '10' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_GUK /*국가기관*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('20', '21','22', '23') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_JIBANG /*지방자치단체*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('30', '31', '32', '33') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_GONG /*공공기관*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '40' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_ETC /*기타단체*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('10', '20', '21','22', '23','30', '31', '32', '33', '40') OR PUB_DVSN_CD IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_ING /*미분류*/
FROM DATA
UNION ALL
SELECT NULL AS CD , '감사민원' AS CD_NM , SUM(CASE WHEN (CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IN ('10','20','30','40','50','60','80') OR CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT , CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN (CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IN ('10','20','30','40','50','60','80') OR CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) / COUNT(1)) * 100 END AS PER , NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '10' AND (CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IN ('10','20','30','40','50','60','80') OR CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CNT_GUK /*국가기관*/, NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('20','21','22','23') AND (CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IN ('10','20','30','40','50','60','80') OR CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CNT_JIBANG /*지방자치단체*/, NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('30','31','32','33') AND (CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IN ('10','20','30','40','50','60','80') OR CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CNT_GONG /*공공기관*/, NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '40' AND (CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IN ('10','20','30','40','50','60','80') OR CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CNT_ETC /*기타단체*/, NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN (PUB_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('10', '20', '21','22', '23','30', '31', '32', '33', '40') OR PUB_DVSN_CD IS NULL) AND (CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IN ('10','20','30','40','50','60','80') OR CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CNT_ING /*미분류*/ FROM DATA
UNION ALL
SELECT D3.CD , D3.CD_NM , NVL(D4.CNT, 0) AS CNT , CASE WHEN NVL(D4.CNTALL, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((D4.CNT/D4.CNTALL)*100, 2), 0) END AS PER , NVL(D4.CNT_GUK , 0) AS CNT_GUK , NVL(D4.CNT_JIBANG, 0) AS CNT_JIBANG , NVL(D4.CNT_GONG , 0) AS CNT_GONG , NVL(D4.CNT_ETC , 0) AS CNT_ETC , NVL(D4.CNT_ING , 0) AS CNT_ING FROM (SELECT CD , CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C D2 WHERE D2.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000047' AND D2.CD <> '000000000' ORDER BY OTPT_SEQ ) D3, ( SELECT D1.CVPT_KND_CD , COUNT(1) AS CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DATA S1 WHERE 1=1) AS CNTALL , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '10' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_GUK , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('20', '21','22', '23') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_JIBANG , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('30', '31', '32', '33') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_GONG , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '40' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_ETC , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('10', '20', '21','22', '23','30', '31', '32', '33', '40') OR PUB_DVSN_CD IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_ING FROM DATA D1 where (CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IN ('10','20','30','40','50','60','80') OR CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD IS NULL) GROUP BY ROLLUP(D1.CVPT_KND_CD) ) D4 WHERE D3.CD = D4.CVPT_KND_CD(+) UNION ALL SELECT NULL AS CD , '일반민원' AS CD_NM , NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '70' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CNT , CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '70' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) / COUNT(1)) * 100 END AS PER , NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '10' AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '70' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CNT_GUK /*국가기관*/, NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('20','21','22','23') AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '70' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CNT_JIBANG /*지방자치단체*/, NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('30','31','32','33') AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '70' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CNT_GONG /*공공기관*/, NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '40' AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '70' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CNT_ETC /*기타단체*/, NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN (PUB_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('10', '20', '21','22', '23','30', '31', '32', '33', '40') OR PUB_DVSN_CD IS NULL) AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '70' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CNT_ING /*미분류*/ FROM DATA
UNION ALL SELECT D3.CD , D3.CD_NM , NVL(D4.CNT, 0) AS CNT , CASE WHEN NVL(D4.CNTALL, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((D4.CNT/D4.CNTALL)*100, 2), 0) END AS PER , NVL(D4.CNT_GUK , 0) AS CNT_GUK , NVL(D4.CNT_JIBANG, 0) AS CNT_JIBANG , NVL(D4.CNT_GONG , 0) AS CNT_GONG , NVL(D4.CNT_ETC , 0) AS CNT_ETC , NVL(D4.CNT_ING , 0) AS CNT_ING FROM (SELECT CD , CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C D2 WHERE D2.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000047' AND D2.CD <> '000000000' ORDER BY OTPT_SEQ ) D3, ( SELECT D1.CVPT_KND_CD , COUNT(1) AS CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DATA S1 WHERE 1=1) AS CNTALL , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '10' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_GUK , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('20', '21','22', '23') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_JIBANG , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('30', '31', '32', '33') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_GONG , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '40' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_ETC , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('10', '20', '21','22', '23','30', '31', '32', '33', '40') OR PUB_DVSN_CD IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_ING FROM DATA D1 where CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '70' GROUP BY ROLLUP(D1.CVPT_KND_CD) ) D4 WHERE D3.CD = D4.CVPT_KND_CD(+) UNION ALL SELECT NULL AS CD , '전년 동기간 증감' AS CD_NM , NVL(D5.CNT-D6.CNT, 0) AS CNT , NVL(D5.PER-D6.PER, 0) AS PER , NVL(D5.CNT_GUK - D6.CNT_GUK , 0) AS CNT_GUK , NVL(D5.CNT_JIBANG - D6.CNT_JIBANG, 0) AS CNT_JIBANG , NVL(D5.CNT_GONG - D6.CNT_GONG , 0) AS CNT_GONG , NVL(D5.CNT_ETC - D6.CNT_ETC , 0) AS CNT_ETC , NVL(D5.CNT_ING - D6.CNT_ING , 0) AS CNT_ING FROM ( SELECT 'A' AS PK , COUNT(1) AS CNT , CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (COUNT(1) / COUNT(1)) * 100 END AS PER , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '10' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_GUK , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('20', '21','22', '23') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_JIBANG , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('30', '31', '32', '33') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_GONG , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '40' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_ETC , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('10', '20', '21','22', '23','30', '31', '32', '33', '40') OR PUB_DVSN_CD IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_ING FROM DATA ) D5 , ( SELECT 'A' AS PK , COUNT(1) AS CNT , CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (COUNT(1) / COUNT(1)) * 100 END AS PER , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '10' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_GUK , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('20', '21','22', '23') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_JIBANG , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD IN ('30', '31', '32', '33') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_GONG , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD = '40' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_ETC , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN PUB_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('10', '20', '21','22', '23','30', '31', '32', '33', '40') OR PUB_DVSN_CD IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CNT_ING FROM PRE_DATA ) D6 WHERE D5.PK = D6.PK(+)

/* kr.go.bai.eip.csp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP141Mapper.CSPDCP411ReportCSPDCP1415RSelect */
WITH /* CSPDCP411ReportCSPDCP1415RSelect */ RCP_DATA AS ( SELECT D1.REQ_DVSN_CD , D1.ACP_YR , D1.CVPT_ACP_NO , D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD , ROUND(SYSDATE - D1.ACP_DH) AS TERM , ( SELECT USR_DFN_TXT_1 FROM TBDCMACM013C D3 WHERE D3.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000047' AND D3.CD = D1.CVPT_KND_CD ) AS CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD , DECODE( D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD, '20', D1.ACP_DPT_CD, D2.HNDL_DPT_CD ) AS DPT_CD FROM TBCSPDCP101M D1 , TBCSPDCP201M D2 WHERE D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = D2.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND D1.ACP_YR = D2.ACP_YR(+) AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = D2.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = '1' AND D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ( '10', '20', '21', '30', '60', '70' ) /* 처리중인 것만 계산 */
AND D1.ACP_DH BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{acpDhs} || '000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{acpDhe} || '235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND D2.FNL_HNDL_DH BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{acpDhs} || '000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{acpDhe} || '235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
) SELECT '합계' AS GUBUN , COUNT(D5.CVPT_ACP_NO) AS TOT_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '1', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_AUD_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '2', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_GE_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0100' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080110_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0100' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080110_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0100' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080110_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071110' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080200_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071110' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080200_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071110' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080200_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0300' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080210_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0300' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080210_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0300' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080210_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071130' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080180_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071130' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080180_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071130' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080180_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_2_CNT FROM RCP_DATA D5
UNION ALL
SELECT '10일 이하 경과' AS GUBUN , COUNT(D5.CVPT_ACP_NO) AS TOT_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '1', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_AUD_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '2', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_GE_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0100' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080110_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0100' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080110_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0100' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080110_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071110' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080200_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071110' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080200_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071110' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080200_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0300' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080210_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0300' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080210_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0300' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080210_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071130' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080180_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071130' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080180_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071130' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080180_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_2_CNT FROM RCP_DATA D5 WHERE D5.TERM <= 10
UNION ALL
SELECT '11일 이상 30일 이하 경과' AS GUBUN , COUNT(D5.CVPT_ACP_NO) AS TOT_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '1', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_AUD_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '2', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_GE_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0100' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080110_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0100' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080180_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_2_CNT FROM RCP_DATA D5 WHERE D5.TERM BETWEEN 181 AND 365
UNION ALL
SELECT '1년 초과 경과' AS GUBUN , COUNT(D5.CVPT_ACP_NO) AS TOT_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '1', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_AUD_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '2', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_GE_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0100' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080110_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0100' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080110_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0100' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080110_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071110' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080200_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071110' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080200_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071110' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080200_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0300' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080210_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0300' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080210_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0300' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080210_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071130' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080180_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071130' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080180_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071130' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080180_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071120' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080190_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '071140' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080220_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.DPT_CD = '0L0200' AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS AUD_080170_2_CNT FROM RCP_DATA D5 WHERE D5.TERM > 365

SELECT TO_CHAR(T1.ACP_DH, 'YYYY. MM. DD') AS ACP_DT ,DECODE(T1.REQR_KND_CD,'1',T1.CVPTR_NM,'2',T1.RPST_PEN_NM,'3',T1.RPST_PEN_NM,'4',T1.CVPTR_NM) AS CVPTR_NM ,T1.ACP_YR||'-'|| F_CODE_NM('1000949', T1.RM_ACP_KND_CD) ||'-'||T1.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO AS CVPT_ACP_NO ,F_CODE_NM('1000361',T1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD) AS CVPT_HNDL_STA_NM ,T1.TIT_NM ,F_DPT_INFO(T1.ACP_DPT_CD,'4') AS ACP_DPT_NM ,F_DPT_INFO(T2.HNDL_DPT_CD,'4') AS HNDL_DPT_NM ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(T2.HNDL_CHGR_ID,'2') AS HNDL_CHGR_NAM ,T3.ORG_NMS ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE - T1.ACP_DH)+1) AS DAY_CNT1 ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE - T1.ACP_DH - ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBBADDED013B S1 WHERE S1.YE||S1.MD BETWEEN TO_CHAR(T1.ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ) )+1) AS DAY_CNT2 FROM TBCSPDCP101M T1 ,TBCSPDCP201M T2 ,( SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO, AGGR_CONCAT( DECODE(S1.OGN_ORG_DVSN_CD,'10',S2.ORG_NM,'20',S1.ORG_NM), '/') AS ORG_NMS FROM TBCSPDCP206L S1 ,TBDCMACM015M S2 WHERE S1.ORG_CD =S2.ORG_CD(+) AND S1.REQ_DVSN_CD ='1' AND S1.ORG_HIS_DVSN_CD = '1' GROUP BY S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO )T3 WHERE T1.REQ_DVSN_CD = '1' AND T1.REQ_DVSN_CD = T2.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND T1.ACP_YR = T2.ACP_YR(+) AND T1.CVPT_ACP_NO = T2.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND T1.REQ_DVSN_CD = T3.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND T1.ACP_YR = T3.ACP_YR(+) AND T1.CVPT_ACP_NO = T3.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND T1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ('20','30','31','40','41') AND TO_CHAR(T1.ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{acpDhs} AND #{acpDhe} ORDER BY ACP_DH

/* kr.go.bai.eip.csp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP141Mapper.CSPDCP411ReportCSPDCP1417RCmplTotalSelect */
WITH /* CSPDCP411ReportCSPDCP1417RCmplTotalSelect */ RCP_DATA AS ( SELECT D1.REQ_DVSN_CD , D1.ACP_YR , D1.CVPT_ACP_NO , D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD , ( SELECT USR_DFN_TXT_1 FROM TBDCMACM013C D3 WHERE D3.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000047' AND D3.CD = D1.CVPT_KND_CD ) AS CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD , D2.HNDL_CHGR_ID FROM TBCSPDCP101M D1 , TBCSPDCP201M D2 WHERE D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = D2.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND D1.ACP_YR = D2.ACP_YR(+) AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = D2.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = '1' AND D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ( '30', '40', '41', '50', '60', '70' ) /* 처리중, 시행문작성중, 조사결과, 처리완료 중 담당자가 있는 것만 계산 */ AND D2.HNDL_CHGR_ID IS NOT NULL
AND D1.ACP_DH BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{acpDhs} || '000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{acpDhe} || '235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND D2.FNL_HNDL_DH BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{acpDhs} || '000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{acpDhe} || '235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
) SELECT NULL AS HNDL_CHGR_ID , '합계' AS HNDL_CHGR_NM , COUNT(D5.CVPT_ACP_NO) AS TOT_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '1', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_AUD_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '2', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_GE_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('60','70') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_ING_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('60','70') AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_ING_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('60','70') AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_ING_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ('60','70') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_CMP_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ('60','70') AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_CMP_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ('60','70') AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_CMP_2_CNT , 1 AS ORD FROM RCP_DATA D5
UNION ALL
SELECT D6.HNDL_CHGR_ID , D7.USR_NAM AS HNDL_CHGR_NM , D6.TOT_CNT , D6.TOT_AUD_CNT , D6.TOT_GE_CNT , D6.TOT_ING_CNT , D6.TOT_ING_1_CNT , D6.TOT_ING_2_CNT , D6.TOT_CMP_CNT , D6.TOT_CMP_1_CNT , D6.TOT_CMP_2_CNT , D6.ORD FROM ( SELECT D5.HNDL_CHGR_ID , COUNT(D5.CVPT_ACP_NO) AS TOT_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '1', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_AUD_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD, '2', 1, 0)),0) AS TOT_GE_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('60','70') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_ING_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('60','70') AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_ING_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('60','70') AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_ING_2_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ('60','70') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_CMP_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ('60','70') AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_CMP_1_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D5.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ('60','70') AND D5.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS TOT_CMP_2_CNT , 2 AS ORD FROM RCP_DATA D5 GROUP BY D5.HNDL_CHGR_ID ) D6 , TBDCMACM001M D7 WHERE D6.HNDL_CHGR_ID = D7.USR_ID ORDER BY ORD, HNDL_CHGR_NM

/* kr.go.bai.eip.csp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP141Mapper.CSPDCP411ReportselectSubList1 */
WITH DATA AS ( /*전년이월 + 당월 처리 목록*/ SELECT ACP_DH ,NVL(D3.HNDL_DPT_CD,D1.ACP_DPT_CD) AS HNDL_DPT_CD ,D2.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD ,D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD ,NVL((SELECT APV_STA_CD FROM TBCSPDCP603M WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO AND ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND RPRT_CD = 'B10300100' AND APV_STA_CD = '20' AND ROWNUM = 1), D4.CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD) AS CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD ,NVL(D3.FNL_HNDL_DH,D1.CVPT_WDW_DH) AS FNL_HNDL_DH FROM TBCSPDCP101M D1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT D4.REQ_DVSN_CD , D4.CVPT_ACP_NO , D4.ACP_YR , D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD FROM TBCSPDCP205L D4 WHERE ( D4.REQ_DVSN_CD, D4.ACP_YR, D4.CVPT_ACP_NO, D4.SRNO ) IN ( SELECT REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO, MIN(SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP205L GROUP BY REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO ) ) D2 ON (D2.REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND D2.ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND D2.CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN TBCSPDCP201M D3 ON (D3.REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND D3.ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND D3.CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN TBCSPDCP301M D4 ON (D4.REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND D4.ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND D4.CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO AND D4.CVPT_IFM_DVSN_CD = 'C') WHERE 1=1 AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = 1 AND D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('10') AND D1.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO IS NOT NULL
AND (((TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),-10),'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),-1),'YYYYMM')) AND ((D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('60','21','70','10','80') AND D4.CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD <> '30') OR (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(D3.FNL_HNDL_DH,D1.CVPT_WDW_DH), 'YYYYMMDD')) > (TO_DATE(#{shcDt})))) ) OR ((TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),-10),'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),-1),'YYYYMM')) AND ((TO_CHAR(NVL(D3.FNL_HNDL_DH,D1.CVPT_WDW_DH),'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}), 'YYYYMM')) AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(D3.FNL_HNDL_DH,D1.CVPT_WDW_DH), 'YYYYMMDD')) <= (TO_DATE(#{shcDt})))) OR ((TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMM')) AND D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('21','10')) )) )
SELECT A.DPT_CD , NVL((SELECT DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M WHERE DPT_CD = A.DPT_CD),'합계') AS DPT_NM , A.CNT , A.PER , A.CMPT_CNT , A.ING_CNT , A.HNDL_TERM1 , A.HNDL_TERM2 , A.HNDL_TERM3 , A.HNDL_TERM5 , A.LAST_MONTH_CNT , A.CURRENT_MONTH_CNT , A.OPM_APV_CNT FROM ( SELECT '' AS DPT_CD , COUNT(1) AS CNT , CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (COUNT(1)/COUNT(1)) * 100 END AS PER , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) <= TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CMPT_CNT /*처리완료*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS ING_CNT /*처리중*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 20 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS HNDL_TERM1 /*20일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 20 AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 30 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS HNDL_TERM2 /*30일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 30 AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 40 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS HNDL_TERM3 /*40일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 40 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS HNDL_TERM5 /*40일초과*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS LAST_MONTH_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CURRENT_MONTH_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD = '20' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS OPM_APV_CNT FROM DATA A WHERE A.HNDL_DPT_CD IN (SELECT DPT_CD FROM TBDCMACM002M WHERE HIRK_DPT_CD IN ('0L0000') /*0L0000*/ AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) UNION ALL
SELECT D4.HNDL_DPT_CD AS DPT_CD , NVL(D4.CNT, 0) AS CNT , CASE WHEN NVL(D4.CNTALL, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((D4.CNT/D4.CNTALL) * 100,2), 0) END AS PER , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1, 0) AS CMPT_CNT , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT7, 0) AS ING_CNT , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT8 ,0) AS HNDL_TERM1 /*20일내*/ , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT9 ,0) AS HNDL_TERM2 /*30일내*/ , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT10 ,0) AS HNDL_TERM3 /*40일내*/ , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT11 ,0) AS HNDL_TERM5 /*40일초과*/ , NVL(D4.LASTMONTHCNT, 0) AS LAST_MONTH_CNT , NVL(D4.CURRENT_MONTH_CNT, 0) AS CURRENT_MONTH_CNT , NVL(D4.OPM_APV_CNT, 0) AS OPM_APV_CNT FROM ( SELECT D1.HNDL_DPT_CD , COUNT(1) AS CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DATA S1 WHERE 1=1) AS CNTALL , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) <= TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1 /*처리완료*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT7 /*처리중*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 20 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT8 /*20일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 20 AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 30 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT9 /*30일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 30 AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 40 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT10 /*40일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 40 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT11 /*40일초과*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS LASTMONTHCNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CURRENT_MONTH_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D1.CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD = '20' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS OPM_APV_CNT FROM DATA D1 GROUP BY D1.HNDL_DPT_CD ) D4 ) A ORDER BY NVL(SUBSTR(A.DPT_CD,3,6),1) ASC, A.CNT DESC

/* kr.go.bai.eip.csp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP141Mapper.CSPDCP411ReportselectSubList2 */
SELECT NUM , NVL(TITL,'합계') AS TITL , NVL(TITL1,0) + NVL(TITL2,0) + NVL(TITL3,0) + NVL(TITL4,0) + NVL(TITL5,0) + NVL(TITL6,0) + NVL(TITL7,0) AS SUM1 , NVL(TITL1,0) AS TITL1 , NVL(TITL2,0) AS TITL2 , NVL(TITL3,0) AS TITL3 , NVL(TITL4,0) AS TITL4 , NVL(TITL5,0) AS TITL5 , NVL(TITL6,0) AS TITL6 , NVL(TITL7,0) AS TITL7 FROM ( SELECT NUM , DECODE(NUM, 9, '취하', F_CODE_NM('1000754', NUM*10)) AS TITL , MAX(CASE WHEN NUM = 1 AND DPT_NM = '중앙민원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1 WHEN NUM = 2 AND DPT_NM = '중앙민원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2 WHEN NUM = 3 AND DPT_NM = '중앙민원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3 WHEN NUM = 4 AND DPT_NM = '중앙민원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4 WHEN NUM = 5 AND DPT_NM = '중앙민원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5 WHEN NUM = 6 AND DPT_NM = '중앙민원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6 WHEN NUM = 7 AND DPT_NM = '중앙민원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7 WHEN NUM = 8 AND DPT_NM = '중앙민원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8 WHEN NUM = 9 AND DPT_NM = '중앙민원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9 WHEN NUM = 10 AND DPT_NM = '중앙민원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_10 END ) AS TITL1 , MAX(CASE WHEN NUM = 1 AND DPT_NM = '서울센터' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1 WHEN NUM = 2 AND DPT_NM = '서울센터' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2 WHEN NUM = 3 AND DPT_NM = '서울센터' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3 WHEN NUM = 4 AND DPT_NM = '서울센터' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4 WHEN NUM = 5 AND DPT_NM = '서울센터' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5 WHEN NUM = 6 AND DPT_NM = '서울센터' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6 WHEN NUM = 7 AND DPT_NM = '서울센터' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7 WHEN NUM = 8 AND DPT_NM = '서울센터' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8 WHEN NUM = 9 AND DPT_NM = '서울센터' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9 WHEN NUM = 10 AND DPT_NM = '서울센터' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_10 END ) AS TITL2 , MAX(CASE WHEN NUM = 1 AND DPT_NM = '수원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1 WHEN NUM = 2 AND DPT_NM = '수원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2 WHEN NUM = 3 AND DPT_NM = '수원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3 WHEN NUM = 4 AND DPT_NM = '수원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4 WHEN NUM = 5 AND DPT_NM = '수원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5 WHEN NUM = 6 AND DPT_NM = '수원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6 WHEN NUM = 7 AND DPT_NM = '수원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7 WHEN NUM = 8 AND DPT_NM = '수원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8 WHEN NUM = 9 AND DPT_NM = '수원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9 WHEN NUM = 10 AND DPT_NM = '수원사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_10 END ) AS TITL3 , MAX(CASE WHEN NUM = 1 AND DPT_NM = '대전사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1 WHEN NUM = 2 AND DPT_NM = '대전사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2 WHEN NUM = 3 AND DPT_NM = '대전사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3 WHEN NUM = 4 AND DPT_NM = '대전사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4 WHEN NUM = 5 AND DPT_NM = '대전사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5 WHEN NUM = 6 AND DPT_NM = '대전사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6 WHEN NUM = 7 AND DPT_NM = '대전사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7 WHEN NUM = 8 AND DPT_NM = '대전사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8 WHEN NUM = 9 AND DPT_NM = '대전사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9 WHEN NUM = 10 AND DPT_NM = '대전사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_10 END ) AS TITL4 , MAX(CASE WHEN NUM = 1 AND DPT_NM = '부산사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1 WHEN NUM = 2 AND DPT_NM = '부산사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2 WHEN NUM = 3 AND DPT_NM = '부산사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3 WHEN NUM = 4 AND DPT_NM = '부산사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4 WHEN NUM = 5 AND DPT_NM = '부산사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5 WHEN NUM = 6 AND DPT_NM = '부산사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6 WHEN NUM = 7 AND DPT_NM = '부산사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7 WHEN NUM = 8 AND DPT_NM = '부산사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8 WHEN NUM = 9 AND DPT_NM = '부산사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9 WHEN NUM = 10 AND DPT_NM = '부산사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_10 END ) AS TITL5 , MAX(CASE WHEN NUM = 1 AND DPT_NM = '대구사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1 WHEN NUM = 2 AND DPT_NM = '대구사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2 WHEN NUM = 3 AND DPT_NM = '대구사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3 WHEN NUM = 4 AND DPT_NM = '대구사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4 WHEN NUM = 5 AND DPT_NM = '대구사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5 WHEN NUM = 6 AND DPT_NM = '대구사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6 WHEN NUM = 7 AND DPT_NM = '대구사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7 WHEN NUM = 8 AND DPT_NM = '대구사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8 WHEN NUM = 9 AND DPT_NM = '대구사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9 WHEN NUM = 10 AND DPT_NM = '대구사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_10
END ) AS TITL6 , MAX(CASE WHEN NUM = 1 AND DPT_NM = '광주사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1 WHEN NUM = 2 AND DPT_NM = '광주사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2 WHEN NUM = 3 AND DPT_NM = '광주사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3 WHEN NUM = 4 AND DPT_NM = '광주사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4 WHEN NUM = 5 AND DPT_NM = '광주사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5 WHEN NUM = 6 AND DPT_NM = '광주사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6 WHEN NUM = 7 AND DPT_NM = '광주사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7 WHEN NUM = 8 AND DPT_NM = '광주사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8 WHEN NUM = 9 AND DPT_NM = '광주사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9 WHEN NUM = 10 AND DPT_NM = '광주사무소' THEN CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_10 END ) AS TITL7
FROM ( SELECT D3.DPT_NM , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1, 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1 , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2, 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2 , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3, 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3 , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4, 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4 , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5, 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5 , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6, 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6 , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7, 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7 , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8, 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8 , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9, 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9 , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_10, 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_10 , D5.NUM FROM (SELECT DPT_CD , DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M WHERE HIRK_DPT_CD IN ('0L0000') AND USE_YN = 'Y') D3, (SELECT HNDL_DPT_CD , CNT , CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1 , CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2 , CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3 , CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4 , CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5 , CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6 , CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7 , CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8 , CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9 , CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1 + CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2 + CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3 + CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4 + CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5 + CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6 + CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7 + CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8 + CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9 AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_10 FROM ( SELECT D1.HNDL_DPT_CD , COUNT(1) AS CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = '60' AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '10') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_1 /*단순종결*/, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = '60' AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '20') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_2 /*조사종결*/, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = '60' AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '30') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_3 /*즉시해소*/, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = '60' AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '40') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_4 /*즉시시정*/, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = '60' AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '50') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_5 /*감사실시*/, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = '60' AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '60') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_6 /*위탁조사*/, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = '60' AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '70') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_7 /*이송(대내)*/, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = '60' AND CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD = '80') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_8 /*이첩*/, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = '70') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1_9 /*취하*/ FROM ( SELECT NVL(D3.HNDL_DPT_CD, D1.ACP_DPT_CD) AS HNDL_DPT_CD , D2.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD , D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD, D4.CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD FROM TBCSPDCP101M D1 ,( SELECT D4.REQ_DVSN_CD , D4.CVPT_ACP_NO , D4.ACP_YR , D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD FROM TBCSPDCP205L D4 WHERE ( D4.REQ_DVSN_CD, D4.ACP_YR, D4.CVPT_ACP_NO, D4.SRNO ) IN ( SELECT REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO, MIN(SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP205L GROUP BY REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO ) ) D2 , TBCSPDCP201M D3 , TBCSPDCP301M D4 WHERE 1=1 AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = D2.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = D2.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND D1.ACP_YR = D2.ACP_YR(+) AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = D3.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = D3.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND D1.ACP_YR = D3.ACP_YR(+) AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = 1 AND D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('10') AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = D4.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = D4.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND D1.ACP_YR = D4.ACP_YR(+) AND D4.CVPT_IFM_DVSN_CD(+) = 'C' AND D1.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO IS NOT NULL
AND (TO_CHAR(nvl(D3.FNL_HNDL_DH,D1.CVPT_WDW_DH), 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(nvl(D3.FNL_HNDL_DH,D1.CVPT_WDW_DH), 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMMDD')) ) D1 GROUP BY D1.HNDL_DPT_CD ) ) D4 CROSS JOIN (SELECT LEVEL AS NUM FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <=10) AS D5 WHERE D3.DPT_CD = D4.HNDL_DPT_CD(+) ) WHERE NUM IS NOT NULL GROUP BY NUM ORDER BY NUM )

/* kr.go.bai.eip.csp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP141Mapper.CSPDCP411ReportselectSubList3 */
WITH DATA AS ( /*전년이월 + 당월 처리 목록*/ SELECT ACP_DH ,NVL(D3.HNDL_CHGR_ID,D1.RCEP_ID) AS HNDL_CHGR_ID ,NVL(D3.HNDL_DPT_CD,D1.ACP_DPT_CD) AS HNDL_DPT_CD ,D2.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD ,D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD ,NVL((SELECT APV_STA_CD FROM TBCSPDCP603M WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO AND ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND RPRT_CD = 'B10300100' AND APV_STA_CD = '20' AND ROWNUM = 1), D4.CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD) AS CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD ,NVL(D3.FNL_HNDL_DH,D1.CVPT_WDW_DH) AS FNL_HNDL_DH FROM TBCSPDCP101M D1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT D4.REQ_DVSN_CD , D4.CVPT_ACP_NO , D4.ACP_YR , D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD FROM TBCSPDCP205L D4 WHERE ( D4.REQ_DVSN_CD, D4.ACP_YR, D4.CVPT_ACP_NO, D4.SRNO ) IN ( SELECT REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO, MIN(SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP205L GROUP BY REQ_DVSN_CD, ACP_YR, CVPT_ACP_NO ) ) D2 ON (D2.REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND D2.ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND D2.CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN TBCSPDCP201M D3 ON (D3.REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND D3.ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND D3.CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN TBCSPDCP301M D4 ON (D4.REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND D4.ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND D4.CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO AND D4.CVPT_IFM_DVSN_CD = 'C') WHERE 1=1 AND D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = 1 AND D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('10') AND D1.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO IS NOT NULL
AND (((TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),-10),'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),-1),'YYYYMM')) AND ((D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('60','21','70','10','80') AND D4.CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD <> '30') OR (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(D3.FNL_HNDL_DH,D1.CVPT_WDW_DH), 'YYYYMMDD')) > (TO_DATE(#{shcDt})))) ) OR ((TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),-10),'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),-1),'YYYYMM')) AND ((TO_CHAR(NVL(D3.FNL_HNDL_DH,D1.CVPT_WDW_DH),'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}), 'YYYYMM')) AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(D3.FNL_HNDL_DH,D1.CVPT_WDW_DH), 'YYYYMMDD')) <= (TO_DATE(#{shcDt})))) OR ((TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMM')) AND D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('21','10')) )) )
SELECT HNDL_CHGR_ID , (SELECT USR_NAM FROM TBDCMACM001M WHERE USR_ID = HNDL_CHGR_ID) AS HNDL_CHGR_NM , HNDL_DPT_CD , NVL((SELECT DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M WHERE DPT_CD = HNDL_DPT_CD),'합계') AS HNDL_DPT_NM , CNT , PER , CMPT_CNT , ING_CNT , HNDL_TERM1 , HNDL_TERM2 , HNDL_TERM3 , HNDL_TERM5 , LAST_MONTH_CNT , CURRENT_MONTH_CNT , OPM_APV_CNT FROM ( SELECT '' AS HNDL_CHGR_ID , '' AS HNDL_DPT_CD , COUNT(1) AS CNT , CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (COUNT(1)/COUNT(1)) * 100 END AS PER , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) <= TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CMPT_CNT /*처리완료*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS ING_CNT /*처리중*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 20 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS HNDL_TERM1 /*20일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 20 AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 30 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS HNDL_TERM2 /*30일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 30 AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 40 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS HNDL_TERM3 /*40일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 40 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS HNDL_TERM5 /*40일초과*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS LAST_MONTH_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CURRENT_MONTH_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD = '20' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS OPM_APV_CNT FROM DATA A INNER JOIN TBDCMACM001M B ON (B.USR_ID = A.HNDL_CHGR_ID) WHERE A.HNDL_DPT_CD IN (SELECT DPT_CD FROM TBDCMACM002M WHERE HIRK_DPT_CD IN ('0L0000') /*0L0000*/ AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) UNION ALL
SELECT D4.HNDL_CHGR_ID , D4.HNDL_DPT_CD , NVL(D4.CNT, 0) AS CNT , CASE WHEN NVL(D4.CNTALL, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((D4.CNT/D4.CNTALL) * 100,2), 0) END AS PER , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1, 0) AS CMPT_CNT , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT7, 0) AS ING_CNT , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT8 ,0) AS HNDL_TERM1 /*20일내*/ , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT9 ,0) AS HNDL_TERM2 /*30일내*/ , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT10 ,0) AS HNDL_TERM3 /*40일내*/ , NVL(D4.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT11 ,0) AS HNDL_TERM5 /*40일초과*/ , NVL(D4.LASTMONTHCNT, 0) AS LAST_MONTH_CNT , NVL(D4.CURRENT_MONTH_CNT, 0) AS CURRENT_MONTH_CNT , NVL(D4.OPM_APV_CNT, 0) AS OPM_APV_CNT FROM ( SELECT D1.HNDL_CHGR_ID , D1.HNDL_DPT_CD , COUNT(1) AS CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DATA S1 WHERE 1=1) AS CNTALL , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) <= TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT1 /*처리완료*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT7 /*처리중*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 20 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT8 /*20일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 20 AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 30 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT9 /*30일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 30 AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 <= 40 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT10 /*40일내*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ((FNL_HNDL_DH IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FNL_HNDL_DH,'YYYYMMDD')) > TO_DATE(#{shcDt})) AND CEIL(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD'))) + 1 > 40 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CNT11 /*40일초과*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS LASTMONTHCNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(D1.ACP_DH, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{shcDt}),'YYYYMM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CURRENT_MONTH_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN D1.CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD = '20' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS OPM_APV_CNT FROM DATA D1 GROUP BY D1.HNDL_CHGR_ID, D1.HNDL_DPT_CD ) D4 ) ORDER BY NVL(SUBSTR(HNDL_DPT_CD,3,6),1) ASC, CNT DESC
